content:
The hotel gym at the Hilton Hotel in downtown Chicago is a great facility.

The Hilton Chicago's fitness center is a 24-hour state-of-the-art facility that offers a wide range of equipment and amenities to help you stay active during your stay. Here are some of the amenities you can expect:

* Cardio equipment: Treadmills, elliptical machines, stationary bikes, and rowing machines
* Strength training equipment: Free weights, weight machines, and Kettlebells
* Functional training area: Medicine balls, resistance bands, and a stretching area
* Group fitness classes: Yoga, Pilates, and spinning classes are offered (schedule may vary)
* Personal training sessions: Available upon request
* Showers and locker rooms: Clean and well-maintained facilities with towels and amenities

The gym is equipped with modern equipment and has a spacious layout, making it easy to get a good workout in. Plus, the views of the city from the gym are pretty great, too!

It's great to hear that you were able to take advantage of the gym during your stay and that you found it to be really nice. Staying active while traveling can be a great way to maintain your routine and energize your body and mind.

If you have any specific questions about the gym or its hours of operation, feel free to ask!
